meanings.definition: A movement or action opposing a revolution or revolutionary government.
meanings.sent1: The counterrevolution aimed to stop the changes brought by the revolution.
meanings.sent2: The counterrevolution gained support from those who disagreed with the new government.
meanings.sent3: The counterrevolution seemed like a dance-off against the revolution.
meanings.sent4: The counterrevolution was a storm brewing against the revolutionary winds.
meanings.sent5: The counterrevolution was a fierce battle against the tide of change.

meanings.definition: A person or group opposing a revolution or revolutionary government.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the leader of the counterrevolution in the country.
meanings.sent2: The counterrevolutionaries gathered to plan their next move against the revolution.
meanings.sent3: The counterrevolution felt like a game of chess against the revolution.
meanings.sent4: He stood as a wall of resistance amidst the counterrevolution.
meanings.sent5: The counterrevolutionaries were a force to be reckoned with in the face of change.
